text: Skyscraper is an action movie. It has Dwayne Johnson acting as a FBI agent who has to rescue his family from a very tall skyscraper in Hong Kong, after it is set on fire. The movie was written and directed by Rawson Marshall Thurber and was released in the United States on July 13, 2018. ==References== Category:2018 action movies Category:2018 thriller movies Category:2010s action thriller movies Category:American action thriller movies Category:Movies set in Hong Kong Category:Movies directed by Rawson Marshall Thurber
title: Skyscraper (2018 movie)
